Message.Title: It's Just One Stock
Message.Msg: Conventional wisdom dictates that you should never have more than 10% of your money in one equity. Personally I don't ever have more than 6%. If you spend all your time trading, based on 5 minute stock movements, like the posters on this board, it's obvious that you have no knowledge about the market and how to build wealth. Wealth is built by compounding over time; when the stock is down, you compound at a cheaper price, so down is good and stocks have always gone up and down - so what's the big deal? Maybe education was too expensive for you, but ignorance will cost much more and like dividends, ignorance compounds over time. Keep up the comedy, but the joke is on you.

Agreed. I was looking for $195 today for options expiration. I see $200 plus easily next week.

It's funny, IBM raised guidance for the rest of the year, beat the number, yet it is falling into a Microsoft malaise today. Should get a strong bounce back next week. Clearly option expiration didn't help today.

Message.Title: YOU ALL IDIOT!!!!
Message.Msg: let see who will be right I told you this is going to no ware report was bd!!!

Low volume day? Are you crazy? Almost 7 Million sold, this has been the biggest day in months. If this was such a great quarter how come the stock is down over $4.00? It should be booming. You are kidding yourself, Declining revenue, profits & 1 Billion dollars for employee layoffs to boost to the EPS. They didn't even use standard GAAP accounting standards for the first time in years. You are stock with this stock that you overpaid for and I guess it makes you feel better posting your nonsense. Please sell all your shares now and get out of the stock market, you have no clue what you are doing and your opinion may effect other shareholders .

Funny? Are you crazy? That quarter was brutal and disappointing. The profits and income were way down plus they took a 1 Billion dollar right off to lay off employees. Yesterday the company re-bought shares to inflate the price, today the market acted accordingly. Much more pain in the near future. This stock missed by over $1.00 per share. Do yourself a favor and sell all your shares, you have no clue what you are doing, put your money in an index fund.

Good luck with that short. We will be heading back to $197 next week, heading to re- test the high of $200 per share. Big Blue got dragged down with the Microsoft malaise. Once we cross $195.60 your short is toast.
